title: Halloween Heat I
description: Halloween Heat IAn Anthology of Erotic Paranormal M/M RomanceFive stories of gay love and passion with a paranormal twist, perfect for Halloween.“Love Lies Deep” by Tristram La Roche“Idle Hands” by Reneé George“Costumes” by Dianne Hartsock“Eden” by Kiran Hunter“Set in Stone” by Elin Gregory
author: Tristram La Roche
